column1: '''''Tree and Leaf''''' is a collection of works by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].

The original 1964 edition only contained reprints (with some alterations) of the essay "[[On Fairy-Stories]]" and the short story "[[Leaf by Niggle]]", together with a new "Introductory Note" by J.R.R. Tolkien.<ref name=RG>{{CG
From 1988, ''Tree and Leaf'' also included "[[Mythopoeia]]",<ref name=RG/> and a later edition added "[[The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth
column2: The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth Beorhthelm's Son]]".<ref>[http://www.amazon.co.uk/Tree-Leaf-Including-Poem-Mythopoeia/dp/0395502322/ref=sr_1_2?ie=UTF8&qid=1301516167&sr=8-2 Tree and Leaf: Including the Poem Mythopoeia] at [http://www.amazon.co.uk/ Amazon.co.uk] (acessed 30 March 2011)</ref>
